title: Multimodal deep learning for predicting in-hospital mortality in heart failure patients using longitudinal chest X-rays and electronic health records
details: D Li, W Xing, J Zhao, C Shi, F Wang - The International Journal of Cardiovascular …, 2025
abstract: Amid an aging global population, heart failure has become a leading cause of hospitalization among older people. Its high prevalence and mortality rates underscore the importance of accurate mortality prediction for swift disease …
